name: 1-Bit War
description:
Made Using Kenny's 1-Bit pack for the RNDGAME  JAM II

####CONTROLS####

WASD movement, aim with mouse and shoot with Left Click

Press ESC to go back to menu

####DESCRIPTION####

Fight 19 waves of increasing difficulty

I might finish the CO-OP mode but I currently lack the willpower.

I got the music from open game art and as far as I know I can use it.
